#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define PI 3.14159265359
string s;
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int n,i,len,base;
	int re;
	cin>>n;
	while(n--)
	{
		cin>>s>>base;
		re=0;
		len=s.size();
		for(i=0;i<len;i++)
		{
			re=re*base+s[i]-'0';
		}
		cout<<(char)re;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
